summary: For all you Jarlaxle fans out there: A wide-brimmed hat, in both clothing and armor versions!
descriptionHtml:
This mod was made because I wanted to make a jarlaxle playtrough (from Forgotten Realms). Essential to this character is his wide-brimmed and plumed hat. There wera aboslutely NO mod out there that added one, so I did it myself!

The hat comes both in clothes as armor version (light armor, as good as elven), and can be bought at Bits And Pieces in Solitude. Both are unenchanted.
All races/genders are supported.

If you've got any suggestions/questions, feel free to post a comment. Also, please endorse if you like the mod!


----changelog-----
V1.0: Main version

V1.1: Textures updated: more detail/saturation.











If you want to copy/edit this file for ANY reason, ask me first!
author: oblivionhot
